entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to update runtime ids using runtimeGroups.props #57702
    untriaged
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    tenet-performance, untriaged, runtime-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • BadImageFormatException when trying to load c++/cli .net 5 assembly into c# .net 5 project #57642
    needs more info, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Feature proposal: remove implicit construction of DateTimeOffset from DateTime #32954
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Http #43916
    documentation, up-for-grabs, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • System.Net - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54857
    documentation, area-System.Net, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • Question: Limits of loaded assemblies #57652
    question, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • [HTTP/3] ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream test fails #53087
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, Future
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds when dependencies publish into dotnet7 feeds. #57716
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • Usage of GetReferencedAssemblies does not return assemblies not used/loaded #57714
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • iOS: building with LLVM causes some exception catch clauses to not work #56100
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Does setting a COMPlus_ environment variable after the application has already started take effect? #57713
    untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • fix PYTHONPATH on Linux #57701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from mono/linker #57700
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove `CROSSGEN_COMPILE` define usage #57697
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Remove scripts for running CrossGen1 on SPCL #57696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix padding mode precondition in RSAAndroid #57695
    area-System.Security
  • Delete code under FEATURE_PREJIT #57693
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make implicit function declaration an error #57688
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect VN when folding GT_NEG(GT_MUL(A, C)) #57686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57685
    blocking-release, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix stress issues around multiple threads throwing the same exceptions #57684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JsonPath not using last frame during continuation #57681
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57677
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57676
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor `EQ`/`NE` morphing #57671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Bump timeout for workloads build job #57637
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57635
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57636
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • test: add Missing unit tests for Grouping.Any #57550
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Assembly/Loader area #57023
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Remove CrossGen1 from R2RTest project #57692
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Enable more passing test assemblies on AOT #57678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.0
  • Remove `FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER` define from non-JIT code. #57672
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Bump timeout for workloads build job #57721
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/runtime-assets dotnet/hotreload-utils dotnet/arcade #57627
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Minor stress improvement #57715
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to Microsoft.Extensions.Http #57719
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #57424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, Future
  • cache SystemPageSize #57718
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Abort response stream on dispose if content not finished #57156
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Bring XmlReader{Async} to one behavior #51736
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor XmlQualifiedName #57646
    area-System.Xml
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • extend the NO_BUFFERING tests and cover all scenarios #57717
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #57628
  • use ArrayPool instead of having a private buffer cache #45690
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #57508
    os-tvos
  • Remove PlainPointer, RelativePointer and RelativeFixupPointer #57707
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Add tizen amrel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
